price: Muntu! Urubaha wubahirize agateka k’umuvandimwe wawe mu kumuhereza imperezwa ku bugwaneza, wongere uhe n’umukene atagira shinge na rugero, n’uwuri ku rugendo yakehaniwe n’ikimushikana iyo aroye, kandi ntugatange mu bitarekuwe canke mu buryo bw’isesagura ry’ubutunzi;
arabic: وَءَاتِ ذَا ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ حَقَّهُۥ وَٱلۡمِسۡكِينَ وَٱبۡنَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَلَا تُبَذِّرۡ تَبۡذِيرًا

meta.transliteration: waāti dhā al-qur'bā ḥaqqahu wal-mis'kīna wa-ib'na al-sabīli walā tubadhir tabdhīran
